1.title: Weave Trippin'

episode of.title: Tiny and Shekinah's Weave Trip (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Best friends Tiny and Shekinah come up with a new business, a mobile hair salon. But a verbal throw down ensues as they try to work out the details of this new venture, putting the entire business in jeopardy. Will the strength of their friendship be strong enough to survive not just another business idea but a cross-country road trip?

2.title: Twerkin' and Workin'

episode of.title: Tiny and Shekinah's Weave Trip (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: The ladies cross country adventure gets off to a rocky start when Shekinah and Tiny wake up on the side of the road in the middle of nowhere. They finally make it to Jackson, Mississippi where they compete in a dance battle to help a local dance troop raise money. But when Tiny and Shekinah decide to get involved in a local pastime, Shekinah finds herself with her pants down.

3.title: Beads, Bachelorettes, and Beignets in the Big Easy

episode of.title: Tiny and Shekinah's Weave Trip (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Tiny and Shekinah arrive in the Big Easy with a bang and are immediately inspired to throw their own Mardi Gras party to promote the weave bus. Things get wild when they meet a group of girls on their Bachelorette party and hit Bourbon Street to help complete the pre-wedding scavenger hunt.

4.title: Preaching Till the Cows Come Home

episode of.title: Tiny and Shekinah's Weave Trip (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: While on their way to Houston to test their new hair product line, the weave truck hits a road block when the bus is surrounded by local livestock. After an impromptu visit to a church, a nervous Shekinah is asked to give her testimony to the entire congregation. Not sure she'll be able to pull it off, Tiny comes up with a plan to help her friend out.

5.title: Rodeo Wranglin'

episode of.title: Tiny and Shekinah's Weave Trip (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: After a long haul across Texas, Tiny and Shekinah arrive in the small town of Pipe Creek where they find all the hotels are booked When all the rooms are booked, forcing them to rough it at an RV park. Wanting to immerse themselves in Texas culture, they decide to help out at the local rodeo. Meanwhile, Shekinah finds herself a cowboy to take her on a true southern style date.

6.title: All's Well in Roswell

episode of.title: Tiny and Shekinah's Weave Trip (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Shekinah insists she and Tiny pull over and check out Roswell, New Mexico. When Tiny reveals she's not a believer, Shekinah goes on a mission to prove Aliens do exist. The two meet a slew of colorful characters while in Roswell, including a real life Alien Hunter who takes them on the ride of their life.

7.title: A Match Made in Heaven

episode of.title: Tiny and Shekinah's Weave Trip (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: In an attempt to center themselves before their big grand opening in Los Angeles, the girls make a pit stop in beautiful and relaxing Sedona. But instead of relaxing, their arguing hits the boiling point and the two stop speaking. Going their separate ways, Shekinah makes a major life decision, she's getting married. Will Tiny be there to support her best friend on the biggest day of her life?

8.title: Hollywood Dreamin'

episode of.title: Tiny and Shekinah's Weave Trip (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: It's all work and no play when Tiny and Shekinah arrive in LA. The girls are in a race against the clock as they strategize as to how to promote their weave truck. Tiny and Shekinah's family make a guest appearance in LA, and they all come together to make the weave truck a success.

imdb.plot outline: T.I's better half, Tameka "Tiny" Harris and her outrageous, laugh-out-loud funny best friend and hair stylist Shekinah Jo go cross country with their new mobile hair salon business.T.I's better half, Tameka "Tiny" Harris and her outrageous, laugh-out-loud funny best friend and hair stylist Shekinah Jo go cross country with their new mobile hair salon business.
